divs: Sighting DetailsI need help was going to visit my brother in another state. I would prefer talking to someone. I am sure I was drugged. I looked from the bus and was moved to a van. They said we had missed our bus.Saw the UFO's from the van. They were 3 circleing a field as if looking for something going across the field. In a patten. I lost sight as we kept going.
Summary: 3 hovering the ground about 20 feet off the ground.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around June 22nd 2010
